title: Trace Anomaly and Non-Local Effective Action for 2D Conformally Invariant Scalar Interacting with Dilaton
abstract: Using the results of the calculation of the one-loop effective action (E. Elizalde et al , Phys.Rev. D49 (1994) 2852), we find the trace anomaly for most general conformally invariant 2D dilaton coupled scalar-dilaton system (the contribution of dilaton itself is included). The non-local effective action induced by conformal anomaly for such system is found. That opens new possibilities in generalizing of CGHS-like model for the study of back reaction of matter to 2D black holes.
